lead_paragraph: A man tried to drown his three children in a pond at a Durham apartment complex and then begged a 911 dispatcher to send help, according to emergency calls released Monday.

headline.main: North Carolina: Father Accused in Drowning Attempts
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Father Accused In Drowning Attempts

snippet: A man tried to drown his three children in a pond at a Durham apartment complex and then begged a 911 dispatcher to send help, according to emergency calls released Monday.
